nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.transactions

Interface TicketService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    TicketServiceLocal
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TicketServiceImpl, TicketServiceSecurity

    public interface TicketService
extends Service
    Service interface for tickets used in case of external (web-shop) payment. A ticket is a temporary unique authorization granted by Cyclos to the member (web-shop) to receive an external payment. The authorization code is passed on by the web-shop to the member (buyer) for validation.
    Author:
    luis

    • Method Detail

      • cancelWebShopTicket

        WebShopTicket cancelWebShopTicket(long ticketId,
                                java.lang.String clientIP)
        Cancels the specified web shop ticket
        Parameters:
        clientIP - the client request's IP used to check if this client can cancel the ticket
        Security note: we can't enforce permission control because there isn't a logged user.

      • generate

        PaymentRequestTicket generate(PaymentRequestTicket ticket)
                              throws InvalidChannelException,
                                     NotEnoughCreditsException,
                                     MaxAmountPerDayExceededException,
                                     UnexpectedEntityException,
                                     UpperCreditLimitReachedException,
                                     AuthorizedPaymentInPastException
        Generates a ticket, based on the parameter data. It invokes PaymentService#simulatePayment(TransferDTO), and only if the payment would be successful, send the request
        Throws:
        InvalidChannelException - The destination member is invalid for the channel
        NotEnoughCreditsException - The account does not have enough credits
        MaxAmountPerDayExceededException - The account has exceeded the maximum transaction amount per day for the specified transfer type
        UnexpectedEntityException - Either transfer type or payment receiver are invalid
        UpperCreditLimitReachedException - The payment cannot be performed because it would make the receiving account go beyond the upper credit limit
        InvalidPaymentReceiverException - When the given DoPaymentDTO is not the system
        AuthorizedPaymentInPastException - When the payment would require authorization and is set to a past date

      • loadPendingWebShopTicket

        WebShopTicket loadPendingWebShopTicket(java.lang.String ticket,
                                     java.lang.String clientIP,
                                     Relationship... fetch)
                                       throws EntityNotFoundException
        Loads a pending webshop ticket
        Parameters:
        clientIP - the client request's IP used to check if this client can load the ticket
        Security note: we can't enforce permission control because there isn't a logged user.
        Throws:
        EntityNotFoundException

      • search
